title: How PM Suryaghar is empowering India’s renewable energy revolution
description: India’s solar capacity has reached 84.24 GW, with goals set for 500 GW by 2030. The PM-Surya Ghar program, launched in February 2024, offers significant subsidies for rooftop solar installations, boosted by advanced microinverter technology for safer and more efficient power management.
